about.me: Manager at Accenture with 9 years experience in financial services with a particular focus on programming tax engines. Computing with Industry graduate from the University of Leeds (UK) – Final year project on distributed systems. Currently studying for a Graduate Diploma of Applied Tax Law. Current location – Sydney, Australia
about.server: Combination of bare metal, dedicated hosted servers and VPS. 1 Block producer (with automated failover) along with 3 Relay Nodes. Main nodes run on AMD Ryzen 5 3600 Hexa-Core with Simultaneous Multithreading, 64GB DDR RAM, 2 x 512 GB NVMe SSD, 1 Gbit/s-Port Connection and 1 Gbit/s bandwidth
about.company: Secure, Reliable Trusted. LEAD believe that stake pool operators should help and communicate with current and potential delegators as much as possible. LEAD are committed to making this a long term project meaning you do not need to constantly check up on your delegation. LEAD believes in decentralisation and is committed to running a single pool along with also being part of the Cardano Bare Metal Alliance. LEADs rewards will currently remain within the pool to increase pledge amount meaning a higher total stake overall. LEAD also runs on Cardano Testnet and helps test the latest releases whilst also testing all operations before deploying to our Mainnet nodes
